text:
A big shoutout to Coach Alvin Huang 🙌

You are truly a swimming superstar! When Samson and Kylo first started lessons, they were super scared of the water.
But thanks to your endless patience, cheerful energy, and fun teaching style, they have gone from nervous little dolphins to confident swimmers who can’t wait for each Saturday lessons! 🏊🏻‍♂️

Thank you for making learning so enjoyable~ 🥰
We are so lucky to have you as their coach! 🩵💙

Kudos to Coach Alvin Huang 👏
Ace Dolphins 🐬

Coach Alvin has been a great coach to our daughter. He is firm and yet makes he’s lessons fun. Diya enjoys going for her swim lessons. From having a phobia of water to now confidently jumping into the water; it’s a testament to Coach Alvin’s patience and calmness with the kids. The admin has also been amazing in attending to our queries. Would 100% recommend!
Coach Alvin of Ace Dolphin is a very experienced and patient coach. Our kids enjoy the swimming lessons conducted by him. We would recommend him highly.
Coach Alvin is very patient with the children. He also jokes with them to make them feel at ease and enjoy classes.
My son enjoy coach Alvin class very much as he is very humorous and most importantly my son able to pick up swimming faster than I thought.
